QuestData.Title: Population Con-Troll
QuestData.Description: I understand you may be headed to Zul'Kunda soon. While you are there, I have a small task for you.$b$bThe trolls are outgrowing Stranglethorn. The Bloodscalp in the West, the Skullsplitters in the East... they pour out of their ruins and into the jungle, disrupting the natural balance of the region. It is time we restored that balance.$b$bZul'Kunda is the Bloodscalp capital. Inside you will find the most high-ranking Bloodscalps. Reduce their numbers, then return to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 7 Bloodscalp Mystics, 7 Bloodscalp Hunters, 7 Bloodscalp Scouts, and 1 Bloodscalp Beastmaster.
QuestData.RewardText: Balance is restored - for now. We may call on you again in the future, $n.
